mode.name: system_dup_supported
mode.query: SELECT count(cc.server_id) as count FROM rhnClientCapability CC INNER JOIN rhnClientCapabilityName ccn on cc.capability_name_id = ccn.id INNER JOIN rhnUserServerPerms usp on cc.server_id = usp.server_id WHERE usp.user_id = :user_id AND cc.server_id = :sid AND ccn.name LIKE 'distupgrade.%'

mode.name: find_target_products
mode.query: SELECT up.to_pdid AS id FROM suseUpgradePath up WHERE up.from_pdid = :product_id ORDER BY id

mode.name: find_source_products
mode.query: SELECT up.from_pdid AS id FROM suseUpgradePath up WHERE up.to_pdid = :product_id ORDER BY id

mode.name: channels_required_for_product
mode.query: SELECT spc.channel_label AS label, c.id AS id, c.parent_channel AS parent_id FROM suseProductChannel spc LEFT JOIN rhnChannel c ON spc.channel_id = c.id WHERE spc.product_id = :product_id AND (spc.channel_label = :base_channel_label OR spc.parent_channel_label = :base_channel_label) ORDER BY id

mode.name: channels_required_for_product_set
mode.query: SELECT C.id, C.name, C.label, 0 AS IS_CUSTOM FROM rhnChannel C JOIN suseProductChannel spc on C.id = spc.channel_id WHERE spc.product_id IN (%s) AND C.parent_channel IS NOT NULL
